name: Hope (Newmark Software)
description:
HOPE is an uplifting game about hope and the joy of breaking free from the norm.

SPACE to jump

R to restore hope

HOPE was made in ~6 hours for #lowrezjam hosted by Devi Ever (@deviever)

Game by M. James Short (@mjamesshort)

End song by Dylan McCarthy (@snifit), (Soundcloud)

Various sfx from Freesound.org
